subject: Simsonn Pro Plus Pedal Support
description_text:
Good evening, I bought your pedals back earlier this year, and I've loved
them so far. But lately I've been having issues with the brake pedal being
all the way up to 100%. I've tried restarting my pc, the app, I've updated
the software, and everything. The pedal doesn't even respond a little bit.
I'm thinking it's the load cell and the wire that connects to the pedal
hub. I am wondering what I can do that would fix it, and if I have to get a
new 200kg Load Cell I will, if that is possible to get just the load cell
itself instead of a whole new pedal set. The order number that the set is
under is #SSN1576. If you guys need any other information please let me
know.
Thank you, have a great day.

conversations.body_text: Hi Lane Davis,  We will send you a replacement brake pressure sensor, as it is covered by a one-year warranty. Please provide your contact name, phone number, and shipping address.Â
